meanings.definition: Words or symbols written or engraved on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The ancient stone tablet had an inscription that told a story.
meanings.sent2: The inscription on the wall was difficult to decipher due to its age.
meanings.sent3: The inscription on the tree trunk made the squirrel laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an inscription of happiness on his heart.
meanings.sent5: The inscription on the ring was a reminder of their love.

meanings.definition: A short dedication or message written in a book or on a monument.
meanings.sent1: The inscription in the book thanked the author for the inspiration.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the inscription on the statue in the park.
meanings.sent3: The inscription on the birthday card brought a tear to her eye.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was an inscription in the hearts of those he helped.
meanings.sent5: The inscription on the trophy celebrated their victory.
